item.title: Being an immigrant in the UK isn’t all doom and gloom
item.author: Felix Editor,Aayush Singh,
item.description: In response to the article from Friday, the 14th of October, I never knew how hard it was being an immigrant until I put it into words, I would like to propose an alternative view and my own personal take on life as an immigrant in Britain. Last week’s article spoke about how being an immigrant is …
